alert.note: Alert for Cleburne; Independence; Johnson; Pope; Van Buren (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 19 at 7:10PM CST until January 19 at 10:00PM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM CST THIS EVENING... *WHAT...A mixture of freezing rain, sleet and snow is expected. Total sleet and snow accumulations of less than one inch are possible, with a light glaze of ice, especially on elevated surfaces and grassy areas through this evening. On Thursday morning, wind chill values of 0 to -5 degrees are possible. * WHERE...Northwest, northeaset, and north central Arkansas. * WHEN...For mixed wintry precipitation, the greatest chance will be during the evening hours. For wind chills, the coldest time period will be on Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slick road conditions especially bridges and overpasses. The timing of the wintry precipitation is likely to impact the evening commute.
info.instruction: A Winter Weather Advisory means that periods of snow...sleet...or freezing rain will cause travel difficulties. Be prepared for slippery roads and limited visibilities...and use caution while driving.
